thread.title_full: Naked dating show goes t**s up as couple ruthlessly body shame each other

author: Sarah Deen
title: Naked dating show goes t**s up as couple ruthlessly body shame each other
text:
&&&&& To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video 
This Naked Dating segment went south after a woman mocked her potential date’s penis size.
Stephen Bear is keen to start a family saying Charlotte Crosby would make the best mum Australian KIIS FM show Kyle & Jackie O brought on another hot young couple, Bonnie and Simon, that were looking for love and willing to strip off.
Bonnie was unhappy that Simon had short hair, so promised she would ‘get the boobies out’ if he was willing to stick on a wig.
Simon eagerly obliged, and Bonnie was impressed by his hairless chest.
She said: ‘Nice body! Look at the hair, it matches so nicely with the body. Body is unreal.’
Bonnie liked Simon’s body (Picture: Kyle & Jackie O) And while Simon, who confessed he had ‘had’ a woman the night before going on the show, was practically drooling over Bonnie’s tattooed bod, everything went south after Simon took his boxers off.
When asked what she thought of Simon’s penis, Bonnie replied: ‘Do I be honest? You must be a grower not a shower.’
Simon gets naked (Picture: Kyle & Jackie O) Simon didn’t take that lying down and told her he’d ‘seen bigger’ after she whipped off her bra.
The wig is off and an unimpressed Simon hits back (Picture: Kyle & Jackie O) Bonnie ended up rejecting a date with Simon, and he wasn’t a happy bunny.
He said: ‘It’s alright I was gonna say the same’ adding, ‘the one last night was better.’
Host Kyle exclaimed: ‘Why are you insulting each other? That’s not the way it works.’
This was world’s away from their last naked dating couple, Danielle and Richie, who jumped into bed together hours after meeting for the first time .
MORE: Couple meet for the first time on naked dating show, get busy hours later
